description: The Chief Information Officer Branch (CIOB) of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) has embarked on an Information Technology (IT) Service Management program to implement Information Technology Infrastructure Library (ITIL) best practices within its organization.
tags: Information Technology Infrastructure Library (ITIL) best practices
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Acquisition of Integrated Help Desk Supporting Services (IHDSS)
#### Supplier Contact

*This announcement invites interested suppliers to submit their proposals for the delivery of Expert level integrated Help Desk supporting services for a one-year period. It is requested that the prospective supplier provide a description of their approach, team structure, and any additional certifications.*

#### Notice Details
* **Notice Title:** Help Desk Specialist
* **Notice Type:** Competitive Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Solicitation Number:** 5000072796
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Publication Date:** March 06, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** April 05, 2023, 14:00 EST
* **Country of Operation:** Canada
* **Service Location:** Canada

#### Notice Description
The Chief Information Officer Branch (CIOB) of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) is seeking a supplier to deliver Integrated Help Desk Supporting Services (IHDSS) as part of its Information Technology (IT) Service Management program. The proposed solution must provide support for office automation tools, products, and services, as well as onsite Operations Support services for IT support and mobile phone support.

#### Key Requirements

* **Deliver a 24x7 Help Desk Support Service** for NRCan users
* **Perform On-Site Operations Support** for IT hardware, software, and mobile device support
* **Collaborate with the CIOB IT team** in implementing the solutions
* **Implement Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to measure efficiency and effectiveness**

#### Trade Agreements Eligibility
This procurement is covered under various Canadian Free Trade Agreements (FTAs) including ALECC (Accord de Libre-Echange Canada-Chile), C-PTPP (Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership), and CETA (Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement).

#### Suppliers' Information
Interested suppliers can obtain the accompanying tender documents by accessing the referenced links provided below:

*English version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/06/48b994003eb8705b28931105d9b4936a/npp_tbips_nrcan-5000072796_en.pdf
*French version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/03/06/74d3ceedaa8f5e75db696
